src/serial/ll-dgr-src/memalloc.f File Reference

Detailed Description

If FLAG is 1 then memory is allocated for the following common arrays:

  • p, p_f (pressure)
  • u, u_f (velocity)
  • rho, rho_f (density)
  • psi_f (chemical potential)
  • ni, ni_f (near neighbors)
  • f, fbar (order parameter distribution function)
  • g, gbar (momentum distribution function)
  • GX, GY (interfacial force components in x and y directions)
  • gradRhoX, gradRhoX_f (x component of the gradient of the density)
  • gradRhoY, gradRhoY_f (y component of the gradient of the density)
  • gradRhoSq_f (gradient of the density squared)
  • gradRhoXX_f (x component of the gradient of the density squared)
  • gradRhoXY_f (product of the x and y components of the density gradient)
  • gradRhoYY_f (y component of the gradient of the density squared)

These are the arrays required by the dual grid D2Q9 Lee-Lin multiphase LBM, and are deallocated when FLAG is different from one.
